title: Coinbase | IC5 | Remote (India)
content:
Education: BTech in CSE Tier-2
Years of Experience: 3.5
Prior Experience: SDE-2 at FAANG
Prev Comp: 60 LPA
Date of the Offer: Feb 2025
Company: Coinbase
Title/Level: Sr. SDE (IC5)
Location: Remote (India)
Salary: 66.1 LPA
Stock bonus: $45,000 for one year
Bonus: 10% annual bonus
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 66.1 + 6.61 + 39.4 = 1.1 cr
Benefits: Wfh setup - 1500$(reimbursable), gym+internet - 5000pm (sent in payslip).
Other details: Offer accepted.

Interview experience: Pretty similar to other coinbase interviews. You can find all the questions in past coinbase experience leetcode posts. The interviewers were very practical and they don't stress on obvious silly mistakes during the interviews.

title: Angel One | SDE 1 | Remote  [Accepted]
content:
Education: B.Tech, 2021
Years of Experience: 2 YOE
Prior Experience: Product Based Startup - gurgaon
Prior Salary: 13.75 LPA 
Previous Company Perks: Company meetups in Banglore, once in Thailand


Date of the Offer: May 2023 
Company: Angel One
Title/Level:  SDE1
Location: Remote
Salary: 20 Lakhs
Relocation/Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: 2 Lakhs
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 22 Lakhs
Benefits:  Internet reimbursement
Other details: No competing offers.
